SELECT pa.id AS id, pa.album_name AS albumName, pa.album_desc AS albumDesc, pa.album_cover AS albumCover, COUNT(p.id) AS photoCount pa.status AS status, FROM ( SELECT id, album_name, album_desc, album_cover, status FROM tb_photo_album WHERE is_delete = 0
AND album_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition.keywords}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC ) pa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, tb_photo.album_id FROM tb_photo WHERE is_delete = 0 ) p ON pa.id = p.album_id GROUP BY pa.id
